name: nitrile-preview
description: A preview of LATEX document generated from Markdown.

liveRefresh.description: Set it to true if you want the preview window to be update itself whenever source editor has been modified. Default is false.

autoScroll.description: Set it to true if you want the preview window to scroll with the editor. Default is false.

defaultZoomLevel.description: Set it to something greater than 1 to change the starting zoom factor.
